name: Neighbor (itch)
description:
Neighbor

Neighbor is a first-person point-and-click narrative adventure about a woman, her lovely dog Willow, and her new neighbor.

It's spooky and there are a couple of swears.

This was my very first time using Unity, and I created all of the assets including music, art, and code on my own. I would have had this done in time for the compo, but. First time using Unity. :)

Tool Details:

Dev: Adventure Creator (in Unity)
Art: Pixaki
Music: Medley

I hope you enjoy!!
